issue.title: [C++][Docs] Scalars User Guide
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13457](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13457). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the C++ User Guide, Scalars are briefly mentioned in Compute Functions <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/compute.html> It would be nice to have some examples on some of the ways a Scalar can be created or manipulated.
